description:
Lightweight and comfortable shorts for warm summer days. Made from a lightweight, pliant stretch fabric that wicks away moisture and dries fast. Just as suitable for light trekking as for an outing in the kayak, or any other active outdoor activity in warm conditions.

Their cut is knee length, and they have a gusset in the crotch for extra feeedom of movement and comfort. Elasticated waist and flexible textile belt with an easy-to-use buckle, zippered fly with a press button at the top. Two hand pockets and two zippered leg pockets.
name: Fjallraven High Coast Hike Shorts - Mens
